attributes.action: Stop media  charging for football games  while covid ban is in force
attributes.additional_details: Only ones with power to stop this extortionate  behaviour  by premier league, sky.sports bt.sport etc
attributes.background:
Force free games onto tv media  stop monopoly  price fixing extorting the national  game and fans putting lives at risk spreading virus
When fans start socialising to cover cost in each others homes dispite rule of 6 , because thats what will happen illegal  or not

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for broadcasters and the organisers.
